treatment.description: Plants 15–30 cm. Leaves: petioles narrowly winged; blades oblan-ceolate or elliptic, 1.5–3.5 cm wide, margins strongly and closely dentate (teeth prominently white-tipped), faces glabrous. Heads 3–7. Involucres 10–13 mm. Phyllaries oblong, apices obtuse or acute (ciliate), faces strongly stipitate-glandular. Cypselae reddish brown, 4.5–5 mm, narrowed, not beaked; pappi 5–7 mm.
